member.name: T:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.IAccessManagerEventBuffer`4
member.summary: Defines methods to buffer events which change the structure of an AccessManager class.
member.typeparam: The type of users in the application managed by the AccessManager.
The type of groups in the application managed by the AccessManager.
The type of components in the application managed by the AccessManager.
The type of levels of access which can be assigned to an application component.

member.name: M:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.IAccessManagerEventBuffer`4.Flush
member.summary: Flushes the buffer... i.e. transfers all stored events to another event processor, and clears all items stored in the buffer.

member.name: T:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.IAccessManagerEventBufferFlushStrategy
member.summary: Defines a strategy/methodology for flushing events buffered in an IAccessManagerEventBuffer implementation, by tracking/monitoring the buffer contents, and raising an event to flush the buffer.

member.name: E:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.IAccessManagerEventBufferFlushStrategy.BufferFlushed
member.summary: Occurs when the buffer is flushed... i.e. when events stored in the buffer are processed.

member.name: P:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.IAccessManagerEventBufferFlushStrategy.UserEventBufferItemCount
member.summary: The number of user events stored in the buffer.

member.name: P:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.IAccessManagerEventBufferFlushStrategy.GroupEventBufferItemCount
member.summary: The number of group events stored in the buffer.

member.name: P:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.IAccessManagerEventBufferFlushStrategy.UserToGroupMappingEventBufferItemCount
member.summary: The number of user to group mapping events stored in the buffer.

member.name: P:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.IAccessManagerEventBufferFlushStrategy.GroupToGroupMappingEventBufferItemCount
member.summary: The number of group to group mapping events stored in the buffer.

member.name: P:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.IAccessManagerEventBufferFlushStrategy.UserToApplicationComponentAndAccessLevelMappingEventBufferItemCount
member.summary: The number of user to application component and access level mapping events stored in the buffer.

member.name: P:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.IAccessManagerEventBufferFlushStrategy.GroupToApplicationComponentAndAccessLevelMappingEventBufferItemCount
member.summary: The number of group to application component and access level mapping events stored in the buffer.

member.name: P:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.IAccessManagerEventBufferFlushStrategy.EntityTypeEventBufferItemCount
member.summary: The number of entity type events stored in the buffer.

member.name: P:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.IAccessManagerEventBufferFlushStrategy.EntityEventBufferItemCount
member.summary: The number of entity events stored in the buffer.

member.name: P:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.IAccessManagerEventBufferFlushStrategy.UserToEntityMappingEventBufferItemCount
member.summary: The number of user to entity mapping events stored in the buffer.

member.name: P:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.IAccessManagerEventBufferFlushStrategy.GroupToEntityMappingEventBufferItemCount
member.summary: The number of group to entity mapping events stored in the buffer.

member.name: T:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.IAccessManagerPersistentReader`4
member.summary: Defines methods to read an AccessManager class from persistent storage.
member.typeparam: The type of users in the application managed by the AccessManager.
The type of groups in the application managed by the AccessManager.
The type of components in the application managed by the AccessManager.
The type of levels of access which can be assigned to an application component.

member.name: M:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.IAccessManagerPersistentReader`4.Load(ApplicationAccess.AccessManager{`0,`1,`2,`3})
member.summary: Loads the access manager from persistent storage.
member.param: The AccessManager instance to load in to.
member.returns: Values representing the state of the access manager loaded. The returned tuple contains 2 values: The id of the most recent event persisted into the access manager at the returned state, and the UTC timestamp the event occurred at.

remarks.para: Any existing items and mappings stored in parameter 'accessManagerToLoadTo' will be cleared.
The AccessManager instance is passed as a parameter rather than returned from the method, to allow loading into types derived from AccessManager aswell as AccessManager itself.

member.name: T:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.IAccessManagerTemporalEventPersister`4
member.summary: Defines methods to write events which change the structure of an AccessManager class to persistent storage. Designed to operate behind a component which buffers the events, and hence methods include a unique id for each event, and the date/time in the past when the even occurred.
member.typeparam: The type of users in the application managed by the AccessManager.
The type of groups in the application managed by the AccessManager.
The type of components in the application managed by the AccessManager.
The type of levels of access which can be assigned to an application component.

member.name: M:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.IAccessManagerTemporalEventPersister`4.AddUser(`0,System.Guid,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Adds a user.
member.param: The user to add.
The unique id of the event.
The historic date and time that the user was added.

member.name: M:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.IAccessManagerTemporalEventPersister`4.RemoveUser(`0,System.Guid,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Removes a user.
member.param: The user to remove.
The unique id of the event.
The historic date and time that the user was removed.

The historic date and time that the group was added.

member.name: T:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.IAccessManagerTemporalPersistentReader`4
member.summary: Defines methods to read the current or historic state of an AccessManager class from persistent storage.
member.typeparam: The type of users in the application managed by the AccessManager.
The type of groups in the application managed by the AccessManager.
The type of components in the application managed by the AccessManager.
The type of levels of access which can be assigned to an application component.

member.name: M:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.IAccessManagerTemporalPersistentReader`4.Load(System.Guid,ApplicationAccess.AccessManager{`0,`1,`2,`3})
member.summary: Loads the access manager with state corresponding to the specified event id from persistent storage.
member.param: The id of the most recent event persisted into the access manager, at the desired state to load.
The AccessManager instance to load in to.
member.returns: Values representing the state of the access manager loaded. The returned tuple contains 2 values: The id of the most recent event persisted into the access manager at the returned state, and the UTC timestamp the event occurred at.

remarks.para: Any existing items and mappings stored in parameter 'accessManagerToLoadTo' will be cleared.
The AccessManager instance is passed as a parameter rather than returned from the method, to allow loading into types derived from AccessManager aswell as AccessManager itself.

member.name: M:ApplicationAccess.Persistence.IAccessManagerTemporalPersistentReader`4.Load(System.DateTime,ApplicationAccess.AccessManager{`0,`1,`2,`3})
member.summary: Loads the access manager with state corresponding to the specified timestamp from persistent storage.
member.param: The time equal to or sequentially after (in terms of event sequence) the state of the access manager to load.
The AccessManager instance to load in to.
member.returns: Values representing the state of the access manager loaded. The returned tuple contains 2 values: The id of the most recent event persisted into the access manager at the returned state, and the UTC timestamp the event occurred at.

remarks.para: Any existing items and mappings stored in parameter 'accessManagerToLoadTo' will be cleared.
The AccessManager instance is passed as a parameter rather than returned from the method, to allow loading into types derived from AccessManager aswell as AccessManager itself.
